titles.title: Mäwaśǝʾt, Antiphonary for feasts and funeral service / Zǝmmare, Eucharistic hymns

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäwaśǝʾt, Antiphonary for feasts and funeral service (fols. 4ra-38vb) II) Zǝmmare, Eucharistic hymns (fols. 39ra-125va).

txstates.txstate: The parchment cover is partly torn off. Some fols. are stained with water. Holes are amended in fols. 1, 12, 22, 70, 73, 82, 90, 98, 102, 105, 110, 117, 118, 121, 127.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (both broken and repaired) covered with parchment (quarter cover). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of the quires, one close to the head and one close to the tail of the codex. Turn-ins of the parchment cover are laced with cord.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 1, stub after 1/fols.1r-3v) – I(10/fols. 4r-13v) – ፪II(10/fols. 14r-23v) – ፫III(10/fols. 24r-33v) – ፬IV(10/fols. 34r-43v) – ፭V(10/fols. 44r-53v) – ፮VI(10/fols. 54r-63v) – ፯VII(10/fols. 64r-73v) – ፰VIII(12/fols. 74r-85v) – ፱IX(10/fols. 86r-95v) – ፲X(10/fols. 96r-105v) – ፲፩XI(10/fols. 106r-115v) – ፲፪XII(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 116r-123v) – XIII(4/fols. 124r-127v).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; elements of the punctuation signs, Ethiopic numerals or their elements. Text I Groups of lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page; names of antiphons (mäwaśǝʾt) followed by feast names; numbers of psalms; names of sections of antiphons and their abbreviations (mǝlṭan and mäzmur); chains of black and red dots separating antiphones. Text II Groups of lines (alternating with black lines) in the incipit page; names of sections (zǝmmare) followed by feast or day names; names of subsections and their abbreviations (ḫǝbǝst, mänfäs, ṣǝwwaʿ) followed by feast names and occasionally by the date of the feast; musical notation: intratextual signs, interlinear signs (e.g., fols. 40rc, 43vab, 45rbc, 48rbc, 48v, 61ra, 70r, 101rv) and elements of marginal signs.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ም፡, ምል፡ for ምልጣን፡ መዋስ፡, መዋስዕ፡ for መዋሥዕት፡ ይባር፡, ይባርክ፡ for ይባርክዎ፡ አራ፡, አራራ፡ for አራራይ፡ ዕዝ፡ for ዕዝል፡ ዝማ፡ for ዝማሬ፡ መ፡, መን፡, መንፈ፡ for መንፈስ፡ ጽ፡, ጽዋ፡ for ጽዋዕ፡ ኅ፡, ኅብ፡ for ዘኅብስተ፡ ግዕ፡ for ግዕዝ፡

extras.extra: - Omitted words and passages are written interlineally and in the margins: fols. 14vc, 15rb, 18vc, 20vb, 26ra, 26vc, 30rb, 34r, 34vc, 35ra, 36vb, 42rb, 59va, 68va, 69vb, 73va, 94va, 98rc, 101ra, 105v, 115rc. - Tämälläs-signs, in the shape of ┴, indicating the place where omissions, written in the margins in the main hand, belong: fols. 5ra l.10, 43rb l.8, 43vc l.7, 45vb l.14, 45vc l.18, 46ra l.1, 48ra l.8, 52ra l.11, 52rb l.19, 62vb l.4, 63vc l.18, 65vc l.6, 69vc l.1, 76vc l.12, 77ra l.12, 82ra l.20, 90rc l.6, 94rb l.3, 94vb l.7, 101rc l.12, 105vc l.21, 109rb l.13, 111rb l.5, 112ra l.12, 117vc l.17, 119rc l.4, 119rc l.15, 120ra l.19, 124vc l.20, 125ra l.4, 125rb l.8. - Signs, in the shape of a cross, are written interlineally, in the intercolumns and side margins: e.g., fols. 12r, 14v, 16v, 17r, 22v, 26v, 36v, 37r, 39r, 95r, 109r. - Small crosses are drawn in the margins: fols. 9r, 11r, 21v, 26v, 32v, 36v, 80v, 99v. - Pen trial: fol. 127r. - Minor notes, writing exercises, drawing exercises (bands): fols. 3v, 38v, 66v, 126v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Undecorated quire marks are written in the upper margin: fols. 14r, 24r, 34r, 44r, 54r, 64r, 74r, 86r, 96r, 106r, 116r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Feast names are crudely written in pen, in a secondary hand, in the upper margins: zä-Sǝbkät zǝmmare: fol. 66va zä-Hosaʿna: fol. 82ra, zä-Ḥamus: fol. 82vb zä-Qädam: fol. 82vc zä-Tǝnśaʾe: fol. 83ra.

frames.frame: - Fol. 4ra-b-c (incipit of Text I): elaborate coloured (red, black, yellow) ornamental band; geometric, floral and zoomorphic motifs (birds). - Fol. 38ra: two simple coloured (red and black) ornamental bands; floral and zoomorphic motifs. - Fol. 38va-b-c (explicit of Text I): three elaborate coloured (red, black, yellow) ornamental bands; geometric, floral and zoomorphic motifs. - Fol. 39ra-b-c (incipit of Text II): elaborate coloured (red, black, yellow) ornamental band; geometric, floral, zoomorphic and anthropomorphic motifs. - Fol. 104rc: elaborate coloured (red, black, yellow) ornamental band; geometric and floral motifs. - Fol. 125ra-b (explicit of Text II): two elaborate coloured (red, black, yellow) ornamental bands; geometric, floral and zoomorphic motifs.
